Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I hav an install with lots of different mods and im experiencing a weired problem:

after some play time (about 30 minutes or so) when i select parts from the parts tab the selecting lags quite a bit. It takes about a second until the part has been selected and i can fir it onto my rocket. Oddly when i copy and paste it from my rocket it works just fine. my ksp takes about 2.4 GB ram so it shouldent be a problem. Additionally i dont have frame drops when flying or doing anything else. It seem strange to me that the performance drops when i select a part.

After a ksp restart everything works fine again, so im guessing iots some kind of Problem with objects not being destructed properly. The only mod i can imagine hooking into the part-selection is KCT.

DOes anone else have a problem like that and has figured out a solution or tracked it to a mod?

thx

best regards
Wait, so you don't have a problem anymore? The restart probably fixed it.
well it did fix it but after 30 mins i have the same problem again. the "fix" is restarting ksp all 30 mins. this bugs me a little and i was wondering if someone else has that problem
